articles.title: Argentina’s Milei to meet Trump for talks on US financial lifeline
articles.content: Treasury secretary Scott Bessent said on Monday that ‘all options’ were on the table

articles.title: Can the UN save itself from irrelevance?
articles.content: As the organisation turns 80, wars are raging in Ukraine, Gaza and Sudan, its core ideas are in tatters and the world no longer seems to be listening

articles.translated_content: [翻译] As the organisation turns 80, wars are raging in Ukraine, Gaza and Sudan, its core ideas are in tatters and the world no longer seems to be listening

articles.title: Trump’s H-1B visa turmoil threatens Indians’ American dream
articles.content: New $100,000 application fee sparks consternation in India’s IT sector and among those hoping to make careers in the US

articles.title: Are we on course to become a Little Brother society?
